title: Director UX Design
description: About Us Twitch is the worlds biggest live streaming service with global communities built around gaming entertainment music sports cooking and more Its where millions of people come together to chat interact and make their own entertainment  Were about community inside and out Youll find coworkers who are eager to team up collaborate and smash or elegantly solve problems together Were on a quest to empower live communities so if this sounds good to you see what were up to on LinkedIn and Twitter get interviewing tips on Instagram and discover projects were solving on our Blog About the Role Twitchs community of streamers and viewers are at the heart of everything we build Reporting into the VP UX Design as the User Experience Director for Watch you will be responsible for the care and development of a firstrate team of designers You will collaborate with partners to develop a customer experience vision that aligns the business goals of the Watch Ads and Sponsorship organizations with the problems desires and needs of our Streamer and Viewer customers We are looking for a design leader that is practiced at tackling hard problems an advocate for creativity creative education and mentorship peoplefirst leadership and who can relentlessly hold onto and center customers in all of their teams work User Experience Directors at Twitch are crucial contributors to their partner teams product strategy a nonstop advocate for their teams customers and the inclusivity of our product You will have the opportunity to do handson research and collaborate closely with engineers and machine learning experts If you are an advocate for inclusive design passionate about coaching designers and driving positive outcomes for creators you will find many rewarding challenges in this role The Design team at Twitch ensures that streamers can sustain their communities and continue doing what they love Our Community Discovery products help viewers to find and experience a multiplayer live stream experience with communities they enjoy Our Advertising products are on the cutting edge of presenting brands to consumers and are an important source of income for streamers As part of this team you will define the future of the customer experience for key pillars of the Twitch strategy You can be located in one of our offices in San Francisco CA Irvine CA Seattle WA or New York NY You can also be fully remote within the USA You Will  Develop a team of dedicated and experienced User Experience Designers Ally with the research team to uncover the intricacies of the customer experience for your products Develop a clear objective design vision for the Community Discovery and Advertising products in concert with product and engineering partners Educate the User Experience Design organization on your customers experiences needs and problems Advocate for resources organizational change and anything else that might prevent Twitch from meeting our customers expectations Contribute to or instigate development of crossteam projects that impact critical portions of the customer experience Define and champion customer research for your team to improve customer understanding and problem definition Build collaborative structures with adjacent design teams to impact the whole product experience Participate in quarterly and annual planning with partner teams to ensure capacity for all projects Educate your team and partner functions about the ways our decisions can exclude specific customers particularly those from underrepresented backgrounds including people with disabilities Set up structures to Include diverse voices from within and outside the organization in design research Contribute to a safe work environment for a diverse group of designers  You Have  5 years working in user experience design including consumer products  2 years managing user experience designers Advocated for customer perspectives with executives and other senior leadership  Bonus Points  Experience as a secondlevel manager of designers Advocated for design and user experience at the highest levels of a midsize or larger consumer business  Developed a design vision or executed complex design solutions for a multisided marketplace Ability to understand and write frontend code HTMLCSSJS Expertise with Figma and Principle  Perks  Medical Dental Vision  Disability Insurance 401k Maternity  Parental Leave Flexible PTO Amazon Employee Discount Monthly Contribution  Discounts for Wellness Related Activities  Programs eg gym memberships offsite massages etc  We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at Twitch We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records  Pursuant to the Los Angeles Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records  Twitch values your privacy Please consult our Candidate Privacy Notice for information about how we collect use and disclose personal information of our candidates Job ID TW8093 LIRemote RemoteFriendly   Our compensation reflects the cost of labor across several US geographic markets The base pay for this position ranges from our lowest geographic market up to our highest geographic market Pay is based on a number of factors including market location and may vary depending on jobrelated knowledge skills and experience Amazon is a total compensation company Dependent on the position offered equity signon payments and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package in addition to a full range of medical financial andor other benefits For more information please visit httpswwwtwitchtvjobsenlearnmore Applicants should apply via our internal or external career site    Remote US Pay Per Year  114300268400 USD
